name: Masterpiece Europe, the European Association of Traditional Tailoring Professionals
membership: Masterpiece Europe currently is not a member of any external bodies.
memberOrga: Masterpiece Europe currently does not have any organisations as its members. Our members are individual professionals.
goal: Masterpiece Europe is a non-profit, membership organisation that aims to connect, support and represent the traditional tailoring professionals from across the European Economic Area.
interests: Budget, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, European Neighbourhood Policy, Fraud prevention, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Arts and culture
Entrepreneurship
EU single market
Youth and education
Erasmus+
